title: Owen is killing it
author: VD
content_html: Owen Benjamin is on tour, and if this clip is any guide, it’s going well. This one will be particularly funny for anyone who, like both Owen and me, watched the Challenger explosion in school on a black-and-white television that was wheeled into the classroom on a cart. And it is little wonder that Generation X distrusts science as well as every other self-proclaimed, self-serving authority.
content_text:
Owen Benjamin is on tour, and
if this clip is any guide
, it’s going well. This one will be particularly funny for anyone who, like both Owen and me, watched the Challenger explosion in school on a black-and-white television that was wheeled into the classroom on a cart. And it is little wonder that Generation X distrusts science as well as every other self-proclaimed, self-serving authority.
